Sword: Deals direct physical damage to a single target within melee range. No special mechanics.
Dash Attack: Propels the caster forward in a burst of speed, dealing damage and knocking back enemies in the path. Physical, no mana cost.
Heavy Strike: Charges a powerful overhead blow over 1.2 seconds. Movement reduced to 30% during windup. Connects at extended hit radius of 4 units.
Whirlwind: Spins with weapon extended during a 0.8s windup, then hits all enemies within 5 units. Movement reduced to 20% during spin-up.
Crushing Blow: A 2-second windup delivers a devastating overhead strike. Stuns the target for 1 second. Movement reduced to 15% during charge.
Fireball: Launches a blazing projectile at 12 units/sec. Instant cast with no special on-hit effects.
Ice Shard: Hurls a fast ice shard at 15 units/sec. Applies a 30% movement speed reduction for 2 seconds on hit.
Lightning Bolt: Channels for 1.5 seconds, then fires a fast bolt at 25 units/sec. Must remain stationary during cast.
Pyroblast: Channels for 2.5 seconds to conjure a massive fireball. Applies burn DoT dealing damage over 4 ticks across 4 seconds. Must stand still.
Arcane Missile: Channels for 1.0 seconds, then fires a seeking missile at 18 units/sec. Must remain stationary during cast.
Frost Nova: Channels for 1.8 seconds then releases a burst of frost in an 8-unit radius. Freezes up to 8 enemies for 3 seconds. Self-centered AoE.
Heal: Instantly restores 20 health points to the caster. Self-cast healing ability with no cast time.
Greater Heal: Channels for 2.0 seconds to deliver a powerful heal of 50 health points. Must stand still during cast.
Arcane Strike: Melee attack infused with arcane energy. Deals higher base damage than physical strikes at moderate mana cost.
Frost Strike: Frost-enchanted melee attack. Reduces target movement speed by 40% for 3 seconds on hit.
Shield Bash: Strikes with shield at close range. Stuns the target for 1.5 seconds, interrupting their current action.
Charge: Rushes toward the enemy at increased speed. Deals damage and applies heavy knockback (force 5) on impact.
Taunt: Forces up to 3 enemies within 6 units to focus their attacks on the caster for 4 seconds.
Fortify: Raises a defensive shield that absorbs up to 50 damage over 5 seconds. Self-buff.
Frost Bolt: Icy projectile that applies a 50% movement speed slow for 3 seconds on hit. Moderate damage.
Blizzard: Channels an ice storm for 4 seconds. Deals damage in 8 ticks across a 5-unit area. Slows targets briefly per tick.
Chain Lightning: Lightning projectile at 30 units/sec that bounces between up to 4 targets. Reduced damage per bounce.
Meteor: 2-second cast calls down a massive meteor dealing heavy fire damage in a 4-unit radius. Applies burn DoT for 3 seconds.
Arcane Shield: Creates a magical barrier absorbing up to 40 damage. Lasts 8 seconds or until the shield is depleted.
Teleport: Instantly blinks the caster up to 10 units in their facing direction. No damage, pure mobility.
Backstab: High-damage melee strike optimized for attacking from behind. Pure physical burst damage.
Poison Blade: Coats weapon in poison on hit. Deals initial damage plus poison DoT over 6 ticks across 6 seconds.
Smoke Bomb: Deploys a 4-unit radius smoke cloud at range. Blinds all enemies inside for 3 seconds, reducing accuracy.
Fan of Knives: Throws daggers in all directions, hitting up to 8 enemies within 6 units. Instant AoE burst.
Shadow Step: Teleports directly behind the targeted enemy from up to 40 units away. Repositioning tool, no damage.
Holy Light: 1.5-second cast heal. Restores 35 health to a single target. Requires standing still.
Rejuvenation: Applies a heal-over-time effect restoring 40 total health over 8 ticks across 8 seconds.
Circle of Healing: Heals up to 5 allies within an 8-unit radius for 20 health each. Instant cast AoE heal.
Blessing of Strength: Increases target ally's damage output by 25% for 15 seconds. Single-target buff.
Purify: Instantly removes all harmful debuffs from the target ally. No cast time, no damage.
Entangling Roots: Roots the target in place for 4 seconds. Target can still attack but cannot move. Deals minor initial damage.
Thorns: Applies a reflect aura for 20 seconds. Melee attackers take 5 damage per hit against the buffed target.
Nature's Wrath: Unleashes nature energy in a 5-unit radius, damaging all enemies in the area. Instant AoE burst.
Life Drain: Channels for 3 seconds, dealing damage in 6 ticks while simultaneously healing the caster for 4 health per tick.
Curse of Weakness: Reduces the target's damage output by 25% for 10 seconds. Single-target debuff.
Fear: Terrifies the target, stunning them in place for 4 seconds. Interrupts all actions and casts.
Summon Skeleton: Raises a skeleton warrior that fights alongside the caster for 30 seconds. Summoned unit has its own AI.
Ice Lance: Piercing ice projectile at 18 units/sec that passes through enemies, hitting up to 3 targets in a line.
Flame Wave: Sends a wave of fire along a line, dealing damage in a 2-unit-wide path. Applies burn DoT for 2 seconds.
Earthquake: 1-second cast, then channels for 3 seconds. Shakes ground in 8-unit radius dealing 6 ticks of damage with brief 0.5s stun per tick.
Sprint: Increases caster movement speed by 50% for 8 seconds. Self-buff with no combat effects.
Battle Shout: AoE buff increasing damage output by 15% for up to 5 allies within 10 units. Lasts 20 seconds.
Dark Strike: Monster melee attack with a giant shadow sword. Direct physical damage at close range.
Shadow Bolt: Monster ranged projectile of dark energy at 6 units/sec. Direct damage, slower but harder-hitting than player projectiles.
Dark Heal: Monster channels dark energy to instantly restore 25 health. Self-cast heal.
Ally Sword: Basic ally melee attack dealing direct physical damage at close range.
Ally Fireball: Ally ranged projectile at 8 units/sec. Direct fire damage at range.
Ally Heal: Ally self-healing ability restoring 15 health instantly.
